title: Feature Stores: Reusable ML Inputs
description: A short lesson to help you apply Feature Stores: Reusable ML Inputs.

hook.text: Five teams compute the same 'user_age' feature five different ways. None match.

buildup.text: A feature store centralizes feature computation, storage, and serving.

discovery.text: It ensures training and serving use the exact same feature valuesâ€”no skew.

twist.text: Feature stores add infrastructure complexity. Don't adopt one until you have 10+ shared features.

climax.text: Feast (open source) and Tecton (managed) are popular choices.

punchline.text: Compute once. Serve everywhere. No skew.
